title: Breast-Feeding
description:
A woman shown breastfeeding a baby, sometimes looking down to the infant and smiling.

This emoji supports skin tone modifiers, which apply to the mother. The head of the baby is recommended to be hidden to avoid a situation where the skin tone of the baby would only correlate to the skin tone of the mother.

See üßë‍üçº Person Feeding Baby for bottle feeding instead of breastfeeding.
apple_vendor_description: The breast-feeding emoji on Apple devices is rendered with gentle realism, showing a mother cradling her baby as she nurses, symbolizing nurturing and the intimate bond between parent and child. Apple's design language brings a soft, rounded quality to the figures and a naturalistic approach to the lighting, creating a comforting and tender visual. This emoji is a powerful representation of motherhood, sustenance, and the fundamental act of providing care, presented with the sensitivity and detail characteristic of Apple's emoji library.
